product.name: Dumplings
product.discription: Dough pockets filled with meat or vegetables, steamed, boiled, or pan-fried.

product.name: Bruschetta
product.discription: Grilled bread topped with diced tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil.

product.name: Dhokla
product.discription: Steamed, savory cake made from fermented rice and chickpea batter, typically from Gujarat.

product.name: Spring-Rolls
product.discription: rolls filled with fresh vegetables and served with sweet chili sauce.

product.name: Bhaji
product.discription: Spicy, deep-fried onion fritters, known as onion bhaji or onion pakora.

product.name: Samosa Chaat
product.discription: Spiced potato-filled pastries topped with yogurt, chutney, and sev.

product.name: Crispy Duck
product.discription: Roasted duck with crispy skin, often served with a plum or hoisin sauce.

product.name: Mapo Tofu
product.discription: Spicy Sichuan dish with soft tofu and minced meat in a rich, flavorful sauce.

product.name: Biriyani
product.discription: Aromatic rice dish cooked with marinated meat (chicken, mutton) or vegetables, flavored with spices.

product.name: Cheese Naan
product.discription: Soft Indian bread stuffed with melted cheese, perfect for dipping.

product.name: Tiramisu
product.discription: Layered Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa

product.name: Rasmalai
product.discription: Soft, flattened cheese balls soaked in sweetened, flavored milk.

product.name: Fortune Cookies
product.discription: Crisp cookies with a small piece of paper inside, containing a fortune or a piece of wisdom.

product.name: Gulab Jamun
product.discription: Soft, syrup-soaked dough balls flavored with cardamom and rose.

product.name: Ladoo
product.discription: Round-shaped sweets made from flour (like besan or boondi), ghee, and sugar.
